body: Highly comedogenic (clogs pores). I work with isopropyl myristate but NEVER in facial products because it‚Äôs HIGHLY PORE CLOGGING! Just beware!Excerpt from online:Isopropyl Myristate is highly comedogenic.Comedogenic ingredients are pore-clogging and can cause breakouts. Even if a single ingredient such as Isopropyl Myristate in a skincare or cosmetic / makeup product is comedogenic, that becomes its weakest link, rendering the product as a whole comedogenic.Acne Mantra ‚Ä∫ isopropyl-myristate-...Is Isopropyl Myristate Comedogenic? - Acne Mantra

I love Cereve, but I'm curious why dimethicon (silicone) is included as it's a possible skin irritant.
